create table if not exists duty(
create table if not exists tradeRecord(
foreign key (seller) REFERENCES userInfo(uid) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION,
foreign key (buyer)  REFERENCES userInfo(uid) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION,
foreign key (did)    REFERENCES duty(did) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION
create table if not exists userDuty(
foreign key (uid) REFERENCES userInfo(uid) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE,
foreign key (did) REFERENCES duty(did) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE
